title: "The Water Museum" by Nisi Shawl
description: The owner of an unusual private museum picks up a hitchhiker sent to assassinate her. This story appears in Nisi Shawl's collection FILTER HOUSE. Content advisory: kidnapping and abduction
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
